entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:07 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:07 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
